data_table.description: Survival and Follow-up Status for Stroke, Original, Offspring, Generation 3, New Offspring Spouse, Omni 1, and Omni 2 (all cohorts) through 2014. This dataset contains adjudicated/validated endpoints information and should be used in conjunction with the corresponding "Sequence of Events" dataset, vr_soe4srv_2014_a_1027s. The associated protocol (Framingham identifier: vr_survstk_2014_a_1031s) has further explanation of variable definitions. This dataset replaces the stroke related variables found in vr_survcvd1_2012_a_0870s.

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: stroke_type
variable.comment: Indicates the type of stroke the participant had. The coding corresponds to the EVENT code from the SOE file.
variable.value: Definite CVA at exam 1, but questionable type

variable.name: sr_LAC_ABI
variable.value: Unknown or stroke type is not ABI

variable.name: strokedate
variable.comment: This date corresponds to the date the participant had a stroke or the date of censoring (last known date the participant did not have stroke). Refer to protocol for further explanation of how the censoring date was calculated. Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.
